data.name: Exposition_001
data.value: Hmmmm...[pause=0] I have to admit,[pause=5] it's not looking good.

data.name: Exposition_002
data.value: Even if we buried them here,[pause=5] we'd not get very far without any money to our name.

data.name: Exposition_003
data.value: I'd hate to leave you both here whilst I'm scrounging up cash in a dungeon,[pause=5] but-

data.name: Exposition_004
data.value: Wha-[pause=10] [emote=Angry]Who are you!?[pause=0] How did you find this place!?

data.name: Exposition_005
data.value: You've got five seconds before I blast you apart![pause=0] Five...

data.name: Exposition_006
data.value: Mother,[pause=5] wait![pause=0] Perhaps this is what we needed!

data.name: Exposition_007
data.value: Hrm!?[pause=0] ...Tcht.[pause=0] One moment then,[pause=5] intruder.

data.name: Exposition_008
data.value: *mumble* *mumble*[pause=0] *whisper* *whisper*

data.name: Exposition_009
data.value: Always the voices of reason,[pause=5] you two...

data.name: Exposition_010
data.value: I'm so sorry about that.[pause=0] I've been a bit on edge recently,[pause=5] you see...

data.name: Shop_Info_001
data.value: Mega Stones are powerful gemstones that allow Pokémon to undergo Mega Evolution!

data.name: Shop_Info_002
data.value: But be careful![pause=0] They put a heavy strain on the body,[pause=5] so don't use them on an empty stomach!

data.name: Shop_Info_003
data.value: Hm?[pause=0] You're asking where I got these?

data.name: Shop_Info_004
data.value: ...Trade secret.

data.name: Shop_Bag_Full
data.value: I would love to sell you that,[pause=5] but I'm afraid it won't fit in your bag...

data.name: Shop_Buy
data.value: Excellent![pause=0] Tell me if you see something you like! (You can use {0} to choose multiple items.)

data.name: Shop_Buy_Complete
data.value: Please doing business with you,[pause=5] friend!

data.name: Shop_Buy_Empty
data.value: I'm afraid I'm sold out,[pause=5] friend.[pause=0] Maybe check back in another time?

data.name: Shop_Buy_Multi
data.value: All of those Stones will be {0}. That OK?

data.name: Shop_Buy_No_Money
data.value: You trying to fleece me?![pause=0] If you've not got the cash,[pause=5] then scram!

data.name: Shop_Buy_One
data.value: The {1}? That'll be {0}.

data.name: Shop_Goodbye
data.value: Thank you kindly![pause=5] Remember, it's a secret to everybody!

data.name: Shop_Intro
data.value: Welcome,[pause=5] friend! How may I help you?

data.name: Shop_Intro_Return
data.value: Is there anything else you need?

data.name: Shop_Option_Buy
data.value: Buy

data.name: Shop_Option_Sell
data.value: Sell

data.name: Shop_Sell
data.value: Sorry,[pause=5] but I'm not running a pawn shop here... Maybe a Kecleon could take that off your hands?

data.name: Exposition_011
data.value: Allow me to introduce myself.[pause=0] I'm {0}, and I'm running a small business here.

data.name: Exposition_012
data.value: You're one of those adventurer's trying to climb to the summit, no?[pause=0] Got an eye for treasure,[pause=5] perhaps?

data.name: Exposition_013
data.value: Then friend,[pause=5] do I have a deal for you!

data.name: Exposition_014
data.value: How would you feel if you were to own your very[pause=30] own[pause=30] Mega Stone?

data.name: Exposition_015
data.value: You... don't know what a Mega Stone is?[pause=0] [script=0]Uh...

data.name: Exposition_016
data.value: Well,[pause=5] to keep it brief,[pause=5] they're gemstones infused with a mysterious power...

data.name: Exposition_017
data.value: One that will allow the right Pokémon to Mega Evolve![pause=0] Imagine evolving even further beyond your limits!

data.name: Exposition_018
data.value: Now these Stones aren't what I'd call "common"... but for you?[pause=0] I can cut you the deal of a lifetime!

data.name: Exposition_019
data.value: So what do you say,[pause=5] friend?[pause=0] Care to make a deal?[pause=0] My little shop is now open,[pause=5] for your eyes only!
